page.title: 17Local History _ Tourism
page.content: It has been said that the most famous pop group in the world was the {"BEATLES". }One of their most famous members attended our school, he was John Lennon. Many Beatle fans from all over the world, especially from the United States of America and from Japan, come visiting our area. The road signs in{"Penny Lane"}because of their popularity keep being taken by tourists. To prevent this happening the words are just painted on the bare brick walls. In the locality other links with the Beatles' work include a coffee house called {"Sgt.Peppers Kitchen." }In the song{"Penny Lane"}the reference to the Bank Manager refers to the bank in Penny Lane.
